TEXT.TITLE: PERINI INVESTMENT <PNV> BUYS FLORIDA PROPERTIES
TEXT.BODY: Perini Investment Properties Inc said it has purchased three industrial/warehouse properties in Boca Raton, Fla., and one in Pompano Beach, Fla., for an undisclosed amount. The company said the purchases increase its industrial/warehouse inventory by about 252,000 square feet. Reuter
